title: Schema for scribejs configuration files
description: Configuration for scribejs. See https://github.com/w3c/scribejs/blob/master/README.md for details

date.title: Date in ISO Format
date.description: Note that the format with date works with the AJV processor, but it is not a mandatory schema item

group.title: Group name, ie, IRC channel without the staring # or & character
group.description: Per RFC1459, a channel name cannot use space or comma

input.title: IRC log; a file name or a URL

nicknames.title: Nickname log; a JSON file name or a URL

final.title: Whether he minutes are final, i.e., they won't be labeled as 'DRAFT'

auto.title: hether the draft label is to be generated automatically into the minutes via a separate script.

torepo.title: Whether the output should be stored in a github repository

pandoc.title: Whether the output is meant to be converted further by pandoc

jekyll.title: Whether the output should be adapted to a Github+Jekyll combination
jekyll.description: If the value is 'md' or 'kd', a jekyll header is added. If it is 'md', the format is markdown, if it is 'kd', the format is kramdown

irc_format.title: Whether the input is of the log format of a particular IRC client
irc_format.description: 'undefined' means the RRSAgent output @W3C. 'Textual' is the only client implemented so far.

ghpath.title: Github path for the upload of the minutes.

ghbranch.title: Branch of the repository where the minutes should be stored. If not set, default is used.

acrepo.title: Github repo name for action issues.

acurlpattern.title: URL pattern used to refer the minutes.

ghemail.title: User's email
ghemail.$comment: Note that the format with email works with the AJV processor, but it is not a mandatory schema item

ghtoken.title: User's OAUTH personal access token.
ghtoken.description: This value should NOT appear in any public configuration file!
